Name: Inscribed weight
Description: On this block, which has a slightly rounded top surface and rounded edges and corners, is the cartouche with the name of Senwosret. This is the nomen of three kings of the 12th Dynasty, although one perhaps may assume that it dates from the reign of Senwosret III because several other weights with his name have been found. The underside mentions the owner of the weight, the interpreter Hor-mery.
